concept.title: ​​Creating the Starbucks Experience​
concept.shortdesc: ​The connection that you create with your customers is the primary reason they come back to Starbucks. For MO&P, the moment of connection happens when the customer arrives for their order at the hand-off plane. Our customer service commitment remains the same, regardless of the channel the customer uses.

conbody.p: Keep in mind that the needs of our mobile order customers may be slightly different than those of customers ordering in the café or Drive Thru. Your mobile order customers value convenience, personalization and speed. A quick "hello" and a smile, along with a genuine "thank you" may be all your mobile customer is looking for. Also, be mindful of new Mobile Order & Pay customers that may be unfamiliar of where and how to pick up their order. Notice if customers look uncertain or need guidance, and proactively ask them if they're waiting for a mobile order. Customers may accidentally come to the wrong store to pick up their mobile order. If this happens, make the moment right by making their order for them and let them know your store location. Ensure your store name makes it easy to identify your store in the App. Refer to the MO&P Store Naming Guidelines – Quick Reference Guide more information.

section.title: Health and safety guidelines
section.p: Mobile orders can be placed from store opening up to 30 minutes prior to close. Mobile orders can only be placed 30 minutes to close to ensure the store is still open upon customer arrival.

If a customer arrives after the store is closed follow existing security protocols for closing and end of day procedures. If the customer does arrive after close and the door is locked, do not open the door or let the customer in the store. A customer may arrive to your store late to pick up their mobile order. Any food or beverage item that has been waiting too long for the customer should be remade upon customer arrival. Health and Safety requirements the maximum hold time for a handcrafted beverages and warmed food items is 30 minutes. Refer to the Coffee and Beverage or Food resource materials for additional information.
